languages.text: "Только ротгат, {mf|господин|госпожа} — последняя бутылка. И то Ризза ее уже почти всю вылакала. Амасек нынче вне закона — он, видите ли, губит разум и тело, а душу сподвигает к ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Только ротгат, {mf|господин|госпожа} — последняя бутылка. И то Ризза ее уже почти всю вылакала. Амасек нынче вне закона — он, видите ли, губит разум и тело, а душу сподвигает к ереси".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."
languages.original_text: "Только ротгат, {mf|господин|госпожа} — последняя бутылка. И то Ризза ее уже почти всю вылакала. Амасек нынче вне закона — он, видите ли, губит разум и тело, а душу сподвигает к ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “我这里只剩下私酿烈酒，大人。只剩最后一瓶了，一大半都被莱萨喝光了。那些人宣布艾玛赛克酒是非法饮品，说会毒害身体和精神，还会把灵魂引向异端邪道。”
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: “我这里只剩下私酿烈酒，大人。只剩最后一瓶了，一大半都被莱萨喝光了。那些人宣布艾玛赛克酒是非法饮品，说会毒害身体和精神，还会把灵魂引向异端邪道。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「ただの安酒ですよ、陛下。最後のボトルです。リザにほぼ飲まれましたが。アマセックは非合法になりました。身体と精神に有害で、魂を異端へと導くなどと言われているんです」
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「ただの安酒ですよ、陛下。最後のボトルです。リザにほぼ飲まれましたが。アマセックは非合法になりました。身体と精神に有害で、魂を異端へと導くなどと言われているんです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Solo licor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La última botella. Y Ryzza ya se la ha bebido casi toda.Han prohibido el amasec. Dicen que es dañino para el cuerpo y la mente y que conduce el alma hacia la herejía».
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Solo licor, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La última botella. Y Ryzza ya se la ha bebido casi toda.Han prohibido el amasec. Dicen que es dañino para el cuerpo y la mente y que conduce el alma hacia la herejía».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Nur Fusel, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Die letzte Flasche. Und Ryzza hat schon das Meiste davon runtergekippt. Amasec wurde gesetzlich verboten. Weil er angeblich für Körper und Geist schädlich ist und die Seele zur Ketzerei hinlenkt."
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Fusel, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Die letzte Flasche. Und Ryzza hat schon das Meiste davon runtergekippt. Amasec wurde gesetzlich verboten. Weil er angeblich für Körper und Geist schädlich ist und die Seele zur Ketzerei hinlenkt."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Seulement du tord-boyaux, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. C'est la dernière bouteille et Ryzza en a déjà sifflé une bonne partie. Ils ont interdit l'amasec sous prétexte qu'il est néfaste pour le corps et l'esprit, et qu'il dirige l'âme tout droit vers l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement du tord-boyaux, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. C'est la dernière bouteille et Ryzza en a déjà sifflé une bonne partie. Ils ont interdit l'amasec sous prétexte qu'il est néfaste pour le corps et l'esprit, et qu'il dirige l'âme tout droit vers l'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Groksöldürenden başka bir şeyimiz yok {mf|lordum|leydim}. Tek bir şişemiz kaldı. Onun da çoğunu Ryzza hüpletti. Amasek zaten yasak. Bedene ve zihne zararları varmış, ruhu kâfirliğe itiyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Just rotgut, my {mf|lord|lady}. The last bottle. And Ryzza's already guzzled most of it. They've outlawed amasec. Said it's pernicious to the body and the mind, and directs the soul toward heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Groksöldürenden başka bir şeyimiz yok {mf|lordum|leydim}. Tek bir şişemiz kaldı. Onun da çoğunu Ryzza hüpletti. Amasek zaten yasak. Bedene ve zihne zararları varmış, ruhu kâfirliğe itiyormuş."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
